#include <iostream>
#include <sstream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <cctype>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>

using namespace std; 

const int INF = 1<<29;
typedef long long ll;

int main()
{
	//freopen(".in", "r", stdin);
	//freopen(".out", "w", stdout);	

	int tt;
	cin>>tt;
	for(int qq = 1; qq <= tt; qq++)
	{
		char s[201];
		scanf("%s", s);
		int l = strlen(s);

		int a[256];
		for(int i = 0; i < 256; i++)a[i] = 0;

		for(int i = 0; i < l; i++)
		{
			int j = s[i];
			a[j]++;
		}

		int count = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < 256; i++)
		{
			if(a[i] != 0)
			{
				if(a[i]%2 == 0)count += a[i]/2;
				else count += (a[i]/2) + (a[i]%2);
			}
		}

		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
